title: An Act prohibiting to brew for sale any ale or beer above ten shillings the barrel, besides the excize.
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, Printer to the Parliament of England,
notes: Order to print dated: Die Mercurii, 12 Septembr. 1649. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
